<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.SLADefinition</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Contains functions pertaining to SLA Definitions.  This script include extends SLADefinitionSNC which contains the default implementation. Additional functions can be added in this class as well as overriding the default implementation.</description> <name>SLADefinition</name> <script><![CDATA[var SLADefinition = Class.create();
SLADefinition.prototype = Object.extendsObject(SLADefinitionSNC, {
type: 'SLADefinition' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-04-20 19:28:34</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6d7b9da5372331003e7d40ed9dbe5da8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SLADefinition</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Service level management" source="com.snc.sla">367209c76d6620100acb70b35343304f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6d7b9da5372331003e7d40ed9dbe5da8</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-11-17 08:58:43</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>132</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
